scripts.build: bun run setup && esbuild src/background/background.ts src/content/content.ts src/options/options.ts src/content/pageBridge.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm --target=esnext --minify
scripts.dev: bun run setup && esbuild src/background/background.ts src/content/content.ts src/options/options.ts src/content/pageBridge.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm --target=esnext --watch
scripts.package: npm run build && powershell -Command "Compress-Archive -Path dist, public, manifest.json -DestinationPath prism-macros-ext.zip -Force"
